targets.query:
from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Hourly Activity")

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 2h, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])
  |> yield(name: "{{entity_id}}")

from(bucket: "ha_events")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /ha_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["domain"] == "sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["state"] =~ /^[0-9.]+$/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r.state)}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["entity_id"])
  |> yield(name: "{{entity_id}}")
